content:
Thank you so much for your kind words and encouragement! I'm glad I could help, and I'm always here to support you and your mom during this time.

Remember, taking care of a loved one is a labor of love, and it's okay to ask for help when you need it. Don't be afraid to reach out to friends, family, or professionals for support.

You're doing a wonderful job taking care of your mom, and I'm sure she appreciates everything you're doing for her.

Take care of yourself, too, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
